entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 15 except minus 20 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15 except minus 20 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
